channel.title: Need help with this! using rune-impact source!@@
channel.description:
hello, so this is the problem i get. source is fine and all, currently editing some things to my liking. but theres this problem i don't know how to fix. when a players plays everything is fine. but on log out, once logged back in. the hp lvl turns to 1? so the player must do ::setlevel to get hp back to 99? and also curses turn back to normal magics. at what file should i be looking in to try to fix?
edit- magic levels go's down to lvl 1 as well.
this is the source link. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=547191.0
